personal.name: Ali Hariz Bin Anuari
personal.title: Software Engineering Student
personal.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & ML Engineer
personal.summary: Final-year Software Engineering student at UTM with hands-on experience delivering production systems during a 6-month internship at Malaysia Airports. I’ve worked on projects like migrating a 10-year-old VB.NET finance tool to Google Apps Script with minimal disruption, and applying NLP to classify and summarize large volumes of customer feedback. I focus on full-stack development and applied machine learning because they let me deliver end-to-end solutions—from problem definition and implementation to documentation and handover.

reference.name: Prof Wan Mohd Nasir Wan Kadir
reference.title: Academic Advisor
